includedAssets.title: Shaun Of The Dead
includedAssets.synopsis: Life's a yawn for Shaun, until zombies take over London. Then it's a no guts, no glory rescue mission: to the pub!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Life's a yawn for Shaun, until zombies take over London. Then it's a no guts, no glory rescue mission: to the pub!
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Life's a yawn for Shaun, until zombies take over London. Then it's a no guts, no glory rescue mission: to the pub!

includedAssets.title: Hot Fuzz
includedAssets.synopsis: Mismatched cop partners Simon Pegg and Nick Frost investigate a series of mysterious deaths in a quiet English village. Action comedy directed by Edgar Wright.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cops Simon Pegg and Nick Frost investigate a series of mysterious deaths in a quiet English village. Action comedy directed by Edgar Wright.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mismatched cop partners Simon Pegg and Nick Frost investigate a series of mysterious deaths in a quiet English village. Action comedy directed by Edgar Wright.

includedAssets.title: The World's End
includedAssets.synopsis: Five friends attempting an epic pub crawl end up with the fate of the world in their hands. Simon Pegg and Nick Frost star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Five friends attempting an epic pub crawl end up with the fate of the world in their hands. Simon Pegg and Nick Frost star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Five friends attempting an epic pub crawl end up with the fate of the world in their hands. Simon Pegg and Nick Frost star.

includedAssets.title: The Cornetto Trilogy Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Simon Pegg and Nick Frost are two lazy best friends battling a zombie apocalypse, an unlikely pair of cops investigating a sinister conspiracy and old friends trying to finish a deadly pub crawl in these three comedies. Written by Pegg and director Edgar Wright.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Simon Pegg and Nick Frost star in these three hit comedies written by Pegg and director Edgar Wright.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Simon Pegg and Nick Frost are two lazy best friends battling a zombie apocalypse, an unlikely pair of cops investigating a sinister conspiracy and old friends trying to finish a deadly pub crawl in these three comedies. Written by Pegg and director Edgar Wright.
